'''1.89''' was an update to [[PlayStation 4 Edition]] released on March 7, 2019, to fix bugs.<ref>{{tweet|4JStudios|1103590596818731009|A small bug fix update is rolling out now for Minecraft: PlayStation 4 Edition. Changes are here|March 7, 2019}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
;6 issue fixed
* Fix for a zombie texture issue in Steven Universe Mash-Up Pack.
* Fix for [[chest]]s splitting apart on [[chunk]] boundaries; split chests will need to be broken and placed.
* Fixed old [[shulker box]]es loading as purple shulker boxes instead of undyed.
* Fix for dispensers not placing shulker boxes.
* {{bug|MCCE-8829}} – [[Nether brick fence]]s required the [[nether brick wall]] recipe to be crafted.
* {{bug|MCCE-8832}} – [[Stone slab]]s can be used to craft [[purpur pillar]]s.
